content.question:
A condenser of 2μF capacitance is charged steadily from 0 to 5 C. Which of the following graph represents correctly the variation of potential difference (V) across it’s plates with respect to the charge (Q) on the condenser?

Answer

options.label: A
options.text: Sol. \(\begin{array}{l}Q=CV \\\text{As capacitance is constant}\ Q\propto V\end{array} \)
